sourcesContent:
export const collegeData = {
  management: [
 {
      name: "Indian Institute of Management (IIM)",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹21,00,000 for 2 years",
      description: "As an institute of national importance, IIM Indore is one of India's premier business schools. It is renowned for its flagship Post Graduate Programme (PGP), rigorous curriculum, and exceptional placement records. The institute also offers the unique five-year Integrated Programme in Management (IPM).",
      courses: ["PGP (MBA)", "Executive MBA", "IPM", "PhD"]
    },
    {
      name: "Atal Bihari Vajpayee Indian Institute of Information Technology and Management (ABV-IIITM)",
      city: "Gwalior",
      fees: "Approx. ₹3,50,000 for 2 years",
      description: "This is an institute of national importance that uniquely blends IT with management studies. Its curriculum is designed to create future leaders who are proficient in technology and possess strong managerial acumen. The institute is known for its interdisciplinary approach and strong research focus.",
      courses: ["MBA", "MBA - Business Analytics", "PhD", "B.Tech+MBA"]
    },
    {
      name: "Prestige Institute of Management and Research",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹7,00,000 for 2 years",
      description: "PIMR is a top-ranked, autonomous private institute in Central India with a NAAC 'A++' grade. It is highly regarded for its academic excellence, experienced faculty, and strong industry connections, which translate into excellent placement opportunities for its MBA and PGDM students.",
      courses: ["MBA", "PGDM", "International Business", "BBA"]
    },
    {
      name: "Indian Institute of Forest Management (IIFM)",
      city: "Bhopal",
      fees: "Approx. ₹7,80,000 for 2 years",
      description: "An autonomous, sectoral management institute under the central government, IIFM is a pioneer in the field of forest, environment, and natural resource management. Its Post Graduate Diploma in Forestry Management (PGDFM) is a highly respected program that creates specialists for green and sustainable business sectors.",
      courses: ["PGDFM", "PGDSM", "Fellowship Program (PhD)"]
    },
    {
      name: "Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya (DAVV)",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,00,000 for 2 years (Varies by department)",
      description: "A leading Grade 'A+' accredited state university, DAVV offers affordable and quality management education through its various departments like IMS and IIPS. It is a hub for postgraduate studies in Indore, providing a wide range of MBA specializations and other management-related degrees.",
      courses: ["MBA", "MA", "Various Diplomas"]
    },
    {
      name: "Jaipuria Institute of Management",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹12,00,000 for 2 years",
      description: "Part of a reputed chain of business schools, Jaipuria Indore offers AICTE-approved PGDM programs. The institute is known for its contemporary, industry-focused curriculum, emphasis on experiential learning, and a dedicated placement cell that ensures good career prospects for graduates.",
      courses: ["PGDM", "PGDM (Service Management)", "FPM"]
    },
    {
      name: "Institute of Management Studies, DAVV",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,10,000 for 2 years",
      description: "IMS is one of the oldest and most prestigious departments of DAVV. It is highly sought-after for its specialized MBA programs and is known for its academic rigor, experienced faculty, and an incredible return on investment due to its very low fee structure and strong placements.",
      courses: ["MBA (Financial Administration)", "MBA (Marketing)", "MBA (HR)", "MBA (e-Commerce)"]
    },
    {
      name: "International Institute of Professional Studies (IIPS), DAVV",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,20,000 for 2 years (MBA)",
      description: "An autonomous institute under DAVV, IIPS is a pioneer in offering integrated courses that combine technology and management. It is particularly known for its flagship 5-year integrated MBA (Management Science) and M.Tech programs, attracting students who want a tech-centric management education.",
      courses: ["MBA (Management Science)", "MCA", "M.Tech"]
    },
    {
      name: "Jagran Lakecity University",
      city: "Bhopal",
      fees: "Approx. ₹5,00,000 for 2 years",
      description: "A leading private university in Bhopal, JLU is recognized for its global curriculum and focus on practice-based learning. Its Faculty of Management provides a modern learning environment with an emphasis on developing leadership, entrepreneurial, and critical thinking skills.",
      courses: ["BBA", "MBA", "PhD"]
    },
    {
      name: "LNCT University",
      city: "Bhopal",
      fees: "Approx. ₹2,00,000 for 2 years",
      description: "Belonging to the well-established LNCT Group, this university offers comprehensive management programs. The MBA course is designed to be industry-relevant, equipping students with the necessary skills to succeed in the corporate world. The university has a strong network for placements in the region.",
      courses: ["BBA", "MBA"]
    },
    {
      name: "Amity University",
      city: "Gwalior",
      fees: "Approx. ₹7,00,000 for 2 years",
      description: "A part of the nationwide Amity network, the Gwalior campus offers a research-driven and industry-oriented management education. Amity Business School provides a corporate-like environment, focusing on holistic development through presentations, case studies, and corporate interactions.",
      courses: ["MBA", "BBA", "PhD"]
    },
    {
      name: "Acropolis Institute of Management Studies & Research",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹2,00,000 for 2 years",
      description: "Affiliated with DAVV, Acropolis is a popular private institute in Indore for management studies. It focuses on making students industry-ready through a blend of theoretical knowledge and practical exposure. The institute regularly organizes industrial visits and expert sessions.",
      courses: ["MBA", "BBA"]
    },
    {
      name: "Symbiosis University of Applied Sciences",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹9,00,000 for 2 years",
      description: "As India's first skill development university, SUAS offers unique, application-focused management programs. Its MBA programs are designed in collaboration with industry to ensure graduates are job-ready for specific sectors, with a strong emphasis on hands-on training and internships.",
      courses: ["MBA (Banking & Finance)", "BBA", "MBA (Marketing)"]
    },
    {
      name: "Prestige Institute of Management",
      city: "Gwalior",
      fees: "Approx. ₹5,50,000 for 2 years",
      description: "A sister concern of PIMR Indore, this institute has carved a niche for itself as a leading B-school in the Gwalior-Chambal region. It offers AICTE-approved MBA and other management programs with a focus on academic discipline and holistic personality development.",
      courses: ["MBA", "BBA", "BCA"]
    },
    {
      name: "Rani Durgavati Vishwavidyalaya, Department of Management",
      city: "Jabalpur",
      fees: "Approx. ₹80,000 for 2 years",
      description: "The official management studies department of the state university in Jabalpur. It aims to provide accessible and affordable management education to students in the Mahakoshal region. The department focuses on building a strong foundation in core management principles.",
      courses: ["MBA", "BBA"]
    },
    {
      name: "Vikram University, Institute of Business Management",
      city: "Ujjain",
      fees: "Approx. ₹70,000 for 2 years",
      description: "Operating under the historic Vikram University, this institute is a key center for management education in Ujjain. It offers traditional MBA and BBA degrees at a very affordable cost, focusing on providing students with fundamental business and administrative knowledge.",
      courses: ["MBA", "BBA"]
    },
    {
      name: "Oriental Institute of Science and Technology",
      city: "Bhopal",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,80,000 for 2 years",
      description: "Primarily known for engineering, the Oriental Group also runs a dedicated management department. It offers an AICTE-approved MBA program that benefits from the group's strong infrastructure and placement network within Central India, focusing on producing technically sound managers.",
      courses: ["MBA"]
    },
    {
      name: "Technocrats Institute of Technology (TIT)",
      city: "Bhopal",
      fees: "Approx. ₹2,00,000 for 2 years",
      description: "As part of one of Bhopal's largest educational groups, the TIT MBA program focuses on practical and industry-aligned education. The institute leverages its extensive network for guest lectures, internships, and placements, aiming to develop competent business professionals.",
      courses: ["MBA"]
    },
    {
      name: "Medi-Caps University",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹3,00,000 for 2 years",
      description: "A well-known private university in Indore, Medi-Caps has a dedicated Faculty of Management Studies. The university offers a modern curriculum with various specializations, focusing on case-study-based learning and research to develop analytical and decision-making skills in students.",
      courses: ["MBA", "BBA", "B.Com"]
    },
    {
      name: "People's University",
      city: "Bhopal",
      fees: "Approx. ₹2,20,000 for 2 years",
      description: "A diverse private university with a School of Management & Research offering various management programs. Being part of a group with a major hospital provides a unique multi-disciplinary environment. The MBA program focuses on developing essential leadership skills for various sectors.",
      courses: ["MBA", "BBA"]
    }
  ],
  engineering: [
    {
      name: "Indian Institute of Technology (IIT)",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹2,30,000 per year",
      description: "An 'Institute of National Importance', IIT Indore is among the country's top engineering colleges. It is known for its world-class faculty, cutting-edge research, modern campus, and attracting the best talent through the JEE-Advanced exam, leading to exceptional placement outcomes.",
      courses: ["B.Tech", "M.Tech", "PhD", "M.Sc"]
    },
    {
      name: "Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology (MANIT)",
      city: "Bhopal",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,50,000 per year",
      description: "As a leading National Institute of Technology (NIT), MANIT is a highly reputed institution. It boasts a sprawling campus in the heart of Bhopal and is renowned for its strong curriculum in core engineering branches, excellent infrastructure, and a vibrant student life.",
      courses: ["B.Tech", "B.Arch", "M.Tech", "MCA", "PhD"]
    },
    {
      name: "Shri Govindram Seksaria Institute of Technology and Science (SGSITS)",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,10,000 per year",
      description: "Established in 1952, SGSITS is a premier government-aided autonomous institute in Madhya Pradesh. It has a stellar reputation, a very strong alumni network, and is consistently ranked among the top state-level engineering colleges, especially for its core engineering branches.",
      courses: ["B.E.", "M.E./M.Tech", "MCA", "M.Sc", "Pharmacy"]
    },
    {
      name: "Jabalpur Engineering College (JEC)",
      city: "Jabalpur",
      fees: "Approx. ₹45,000 per year",
      description: "JEC is one of India's oldest engineering colleges, established in 1947. This government institution has a rich legacy and a vast campus. It is highly respected in the region for providing quality, affordable education, particularly in civil, mechanical, and electrical engineering.",
      courses: ["B.E.", "M.E.", "MCA", "PhD"]
    },
    {
      name: "Madhav Institute of Technology & Science (MITS)",
      city: "Gwalior",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,00,000 per year",
      description: "MITS is a prestigious government-aided autonomous institute established in 1957. It is known for its academic discipline, good infrastructure, and a wide array of engineering disciplines. The institute maintains a strong academic record and is a preferred choice in the Gwalior region.",
      courses: ["B.E.", "M.Tech", "MCA", "Architecture"]
    },
    {
      name: "Institute of Engineering and Technology, DAVV",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹90,000 per year",
      description: "IET is the highly sought-after engineering institute of Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya. It is known for providing excellent engineering education at a very low cost. Admissions are highly competitive, and it is considered one of the best engineering colleges in Indore.",
      courses: ["B.E.", "M.E.", "Part-time M.E."]
    },
    {
      name: "Lakshmi Narain College of Technology (LNCT)",
      city: "Bhopal",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,30,000 per year",
      description: "LNCT is a top-ranked private engineering college group in Madhya Pradesh. It is particularly known for its excellent placements in the Computer Science and IT branches, a disciplined academic environment, and a strong focus on preparing students for the corporate world.",
      courses: ["B.Tech", "M.Tech", "MCA"]
    },
    {
      name: "Technocrats Institute of Technology (TIT)",
      city: "Bhopal",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,10,000 per year",
      description: "The TIT Group is a prominent name in Bhopal for technical education. It is known for its large student intake, good placements in IT service companies, and robust infrastructure across its multiple campuses. It is a popular choice for students seeking a career in the IT sector.",
      courses: ["B.Tech", "M.Tech", "MBA"]
    },
    {
      name: "Medi-Caps University",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,80,000 per year",
      description: "A well-established private university with strong roots in engineering education. Medi-Caps is known for its modern infrastructure, industry-aligned curriculum, and a strong focus on research and innovation. It offers a wide range of specializations in engineering and technology.",
      courses: ["B.Tech", "M.Tech", "PhD"]
    },
    {
      name: "Acropolis Institute of Technology and Research",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,00,000 per year",
      description: "Acropolis is a leading private engineering college in Indore, affiliated with RGPV. It has a good academic reputation, decent infrastructure, and a consistent placement record. The institute focuses on practical learning and overall student development.",
      courses: ["B.Tech", "M.Tech", "MCA"]
    },
    {
      name: "Oriental Institute of Science & Technology (OIST)",
      city: "Bhopal",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,00,000 per year",
      description: "Part of the Oriental Group, OIST is one of the pioneering private engineering colleges in Bhopal. It has a well-established campus and a reputation for providing quality technical education and has been a consistent performer in terms of placements over the years.",
      courses: ["B.Tech", "M.Tech", "MCA"]
    },
    {
      name: "Ujjain Engineering College",
      city: "Ujjain",
      fees: "Approx. ₹40,000 per year",
      description: "This is a government engineering college serving the Ujjain division. It provides affordable and accessible engineering education with a focus on core disciplines. The college is known for its legacy and serves as an important technical hub in the region.",
      courses: ["B.E.", "M.E."]
    },
    {
      name: "Rewa Engineering College",
      city: "Rewa",
      fees: "Approx. ₹40,000 per year",
      description: "A government engineering institution established to cater to the students of the Vindhya region. It plays a crucial role in providing technical education in this part of the state, offering foundational engineering programs at a highly subsidized cost.",
      courses: ["B.E."]
    },
    {
      name: "Samrat Ashok Technological Institute (SATI)",
      city: "Vidisha",
      fees: "Approx. ₹85,000 per year",
      description: "SATI is a well-respected, government-aided autonomous institute established in 1960. It has a large, green campus and is known for its strong focus on core engineering branches. The institute has a legacy of producing skilled engineers for various public and private sectors.",
      courses: ["B.E.", "M.Tech"]
    },
    {
      name: "Rustamji Institute of Technology (RJIT)",
      city: "Tekanpur",
      fees: "Approx. ₹90,000 per year",
      description: "RJIT is a unique engineering college established and managed by the Border Security Force (BSF). It primarily serves the wards of BSF and other armed forces personnel, fostering a highly disciplined and patriotic environment alongside technical education.",
      courses: ["B.E."]
    },
    {
      name: "IPS Academy, Institute of Engineering & Science",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,10,000 per year",
      description: "A part of a massive educational campus, the Institute of Engineering & Science at IPS Academy is one of the largest private engineering colleges in the state. It is known for its vast infrastructure, wide range of engineering disciplines, and diverse student activities.",
      courses: ["B.Tech", "M.Tech"]
    },
    {
      name: "Jaypee University of Engineering and Technology",
      city: "Guna",
      fees: "Approx. ₹2,60,000 per year",
      description: "JUET is a modern private university established by the Jaypee Group. It is known for its excellent infrastructure, research-oriented curriculum, and focus on specialized engineering fields. The university has a fully residential campus and a rigorous academic culture.",
      courses: ["B.Tech", "M.Tech", "PhD"]
    },
    {
      name: "ITM University",
      city: "Gwalior",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,70,000 per year",
      description: "A leading private university in Gwalior, ITM has a well-equipped School of Engineering and Technology. The university is known for its modern campus, flexible credit system, and collaborations with industry for internships and placements.",
      courses: ["B.Tech", "M.Tech", "BCA", "MCA"]
    },
    {
      name: "Shri Vaishnav Vidyapeeth Vishwavidyalaya (SVVV)",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,40,000 per year",
      description: "Managed by the Shri Vaishnav group of trusts, SVVV is a private university with a strong focus on technical education. It offers a wide array of engineering specializations and is known for its good infrastructure and growing industry linkages.",
      courses: ["B.Tech", "M.Tech", "PhD"]
    },
    {
      name: "Truba Institute of Engineering and Information Technology",
      city: "Bhopal",
      fees: "Approx. ₹95,000 per year",
      description: "Truba is a well-regarded private engineering college in Bhopal, known for its specific focus on computer science and IT-related branches. The institute has a good academic environment and a consistent record of placing students in the IT industry.",
      courses: ["B.Tech", "M.Tech"]
    }

  law: [
   {
      name: "National Law Institute University (NLIU)",

It aims to provide high-quality legal education with a focus on research and practical skills. The university has modern infrastructure and is building a strong academic foundation.",

    },

    },

      fees: "Approx. ₹1,00,000 per year",
      description: "This department offers integrated law programs within a premier management institute. This provides a unique inter-disciplinary advantage, especially for students interested in corporate law, business, and commerce, blending legal studies with management principles.",

    },
    {
      name: "Renaissance Law College",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹60,000 per year",
      description: "A part of Renaissance University, this college provides accessible legal education in Indore. It focuses on foundational law programs and prepares students for litigation and judicial services.",
      courses: ["LL.B.", "B.A. LL.B."]
    },
    {
      name: "Sage University, Institute of Law",
      city: "Indore",
      fees: "Approx. ₹1,00,000 per year",

      courses: ["B.A. LL.B. (Hons.)", "BBA LL.B. (Hons.)", "LL.M."]
    },
    {
      name: "School of Law, ITM University",

      fees: "Approx. ₹1,10,000 per year",
      description: "The law school at ITM University in Gwalior offers a range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs. It emphasizes a mix of theoretical knowledge and practical skills through moot courts, seminars, and legal aid clinics.",
      courses: ["BBA LL.B. (Hons.)", "LL.M.", "PhD"]

    {
      name: "Dr. Harisingh Gour University, Department of Law",

      description: "Being a Central University, its Department of Law holds significant prestige. It offers high-quality legal education at a very minimal fee. The department has a long-standing academic tradition and strong faculty.",
      courses: ["B.A. LL.B.", "LL.M.", "PhD"]
    }
